item.title: Enhanced Sessions 819 with Sunny Lax - Hosted by Farius
item.content:encoded:
This week Farius is back live from the Enhanced Studios in London, as we welcome Sunny Lax to Enhanced Sessions to celebrate his Eternal Return EP out next week on Enhanced Progressive! We also have the latest releases from Klur, Falden, PRAANA, Above & Beyond, Ginchy, SILK, Ben Nicky, Giuseppe Ottaviani, and more.

item.title: Enhanced Sessions 764 with Lili Chan - Hosted by Farius
item.content:encoded:
This week Farius is back live from the Enhanced Studios in London, as we welcome Lili Chan to Enhanced Sessions to for an exclusive guest mix including a preview of some unreleased music coming soon on Colorize! We also have the latest releases from Armin van Buuren, Estiva, Farius, Modera, Steve Brian, and more.

item.title: Monstercat Silk Showcase 600 (Various Hosts | Special Guest: BT)
item.content:encoded:
Featuring 4+ hours of melodic progressive house & trance highlights from Silk’s catalog (2008-2021), the milestone 600th episode of our weekly Monstercat Silk Showcase radio show & podcast is here! The show is co-hosted by Monstercat Silk Label Director Jacob Henry, as well as resident artists Sundriver, Terry Da Libra, Jayeson Andel, Vintage & Morelli, A.M.R, and Tom Fall. It is our extraordinary privilege to welcome BT, one of Silk’s biggest musical inspirations, as our featured guest. Celebrate with us, as we travel back to 2008 (when Silk was born) and share highlights from our catalog…through the present day.
Tracklist monster.cat/MSS600
Thank you for listening to Monstercat Silk Showcase! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: Silk Music Showcase 581 (Jacob Henry Mix – “One Step Forward” Edition)
item.content:encoded: Beginning February 17th, Monstercat Silk Showcase will be our weekly radio show & podcast, featuring emotive and intelligent house, progressive, trance, & chillout. The show will pick up where Silk Music Showcase left off, so the “first” episode of Monstercat Silk Showcase will be episode 582. Label Director Jacob Henry and residents Tom Fall, Jayeson Andel, Terry Da Libra, Vintage & Morelli, A.M.R, and Sundriver co-host the show. We invite you to experience each new episode of our show every Wednesday at 2pm PT on Monstercat’s Twitch, as well as all podcasting apps and major streaming services, starting February 17, 2021. Tracklist: 1. Direct – One Step Forward [Monstercat] [00:00] 2. Forty Cats – From The North [Monstercat] [03:36] 3. PROFF – Dark Magic [Monstercat] [09:39] 4. meHiLove – Aspiration [Monstercat] [17:30] 5. Skua & Cosmaks – ID [Monstercat] [22:55] 6. Vintage & Morelli – Come Home [Monstercat] [26:46] 7. Glaue – Losing You [Monstercat] [32:53] Silk Selection: 8. Shingo Nakamura – Glow [Monstercat] [38:44] 9. Shingo Nakamura & Kazusa – Move On [Monstercat] [44:51] 10. Jacob Henry & Coastal – Serengeti [Monstercat] [51:57] Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: Silk Music Showcase 560 (A.M.R Mix)
item.content:encoded: It is our great joy to announce the release of A.M.R’s debut artist album, “A Place For Everything,” out now. A pure and poignant journey from start to finish, this album is a reflection of A.M.R’s extraordinary artistic gifts, not to mention his own sensitivity and sincerity, as a human being. Click here to download/stream the album. Tracklist: 1. Odsen – Onism [Silk Music] [0:00] 2. Moya (US) – Efflorescence (djimboh Remix) [Organic Culture Recordings] [3:58] 3. item.title: Silk Music Showcase 556 (A.M.R Mix – “A Place For Everything” Edition)
item.content:encoded: Silk Music Family, it is our great joy to announce the release of A.M.R’s debut artist album, “A Place For Everything,” out today. A pure and poignant journey from start to finish, this album is a reflection of A.M.R’s extraordinary artistic gifts, not to mention his own sensitivity and sincerity, as a human being. Click here to download/stream the album. Tracklist: 1. A.M.R – Crystal Fountain [Out now on “A Place For Everything” / Silk Music] [00:00] 2. about : river – Silver Dusk (Volen Sentir Retouch) [Nie Wieder Schlafen] [6:09] Silk Selection: 3. A.M.R – In The Mornin’ [Out now on “A Place For Everything” / Silk Music] [12:57] 4. Erdi Irmak – When the Rain Begins to Fall [Where The Heart Is] [18:09] 5.
